{Grimlock}

    Grimlock stomped down the corridor, his large feet clanking loudly on
the metallic floor of the corridor. At each door he stopped a moment raised
his black fist and pounded three solid times on the portal before speaking,
"Me Grimlock say speak up any bot! Me looking for bots still working! Me
Grimlock say speak up!"

    At each silent room he moved on, hammering on each door in turn, growing
more bored with each door as he looked down at Daytripper, "Me Grimlock no
like playing hide and seek. Me say we go to mess hall. Me Grimlock hungry,
me say bots come find us there!"
